heading: Experience seamless transactions with our integrated wallet

heading: Sender or a Driver - You Choose!
paragraph: Switch your profile between being a customer and a driver. This means you can send shipments when you need to and switch to earning money as a driver when you want to, all within the same app. Itâ€™s all about giving you the power of choice!

heading: Save money with our promo codes and subscription plans
paragraph: ShipPack offers a range of promo codes and subscription plans to help you save money on your shipments.

heading: A PIN for Your Peace of Mind.
paragraph: Worried about the safety of your shipment? Get a unique PIN when you place a shipment order. Our unique PIN system adds a barrier only the intended recipient can cross.

heading: Earn rewards by referring new customers and completing shipments
paragraph: You can earn rewards by referring new customers to ShipPack through our affiliate program or by completing shipments as a shipper. You decide.
